name: Card Blitz: WWII
description:
WWII card game - simple but deep, challenging but friendly. If you are into military history, collecting, and fast game sessions then Card Blitz is perfect for you! Dive into the harsh world of ruthless and historical card battles! Collect troops and trophies. Gather legendary generals under your command!

  • Over 150 cards: tanks, infantry, aircraft, artillery, support units, and generals!
  • Welcome history figures to your army: Rommel and Rokossovsky are yours to command!
  • Fight against other players and earn well-deserved trophies!
  • Learn, adapt, collect, and build the legendary deck!
